ComicInfo.Summary:
Abraham unveils the truth of his traumatic experience but Rick convinces him that the zombie plague has changed everyone. For good or bad, but everyone has been forced to change in order to survive.
Later, they arrived to Rick's old house where the Jones were staying. Sadly, Morgan was not able to protect his son and he became a zombie. Morgan will carry the burden of showing that there's a thin line between love and insanity.
ComicInfo.Tags: Andrea,Dale,Abraham Ford,Morgan Jones,Zombies,Duane Jones,Rosita Espinosa,Michonne,Georgia,Eugene Porter,Rick Grimes,Carl Grimes
ComicInfo.Title: What We Become, Pt. 4
